caption.p: Histopathological examination of Kidney tissues of the experimental rats.

Legend: Group 1 (Normal control): No visible lesion, Group 2 (Venom control): Few foci of tubular degeneration, Group 3(Antivenom control): Mild congestion of the renal cortex, Group 4(venom/300 mg/kg n-hexane): Few tubules and glomeruli appear degenerated (necrosis), Group 5(venom/600 mg/kg n-hexane): No visible lesion, Group 6(venom/300 mg/kg ethylacetate):Moderate congestion of renal cortex, Group 7(venom/600 mg/kg ethyl acetate): No visible lesion, Group 8(venom/300 mg/kg ethanol): Morderate congestion of the renal cortex, Group 9(venom/600 mg/kg ethanol): No visible lesion.
